'''Chris''' is a waiter who almost burned his restaurant down with a match.

==History==
During his sixth birthday presentation of the day, Chris lit the candle on the small cake and then blew it out. He threw the match away, but it reignited and caused a large fire which ultimately burned the whole building down.

==Career==
He was a waiter at Flanner's until it burned down.

==Notes and Trivia==
He's named after a friend of writer [[Barbara Friend|Barbara Kaye Friend]].
